activities.name: The Importance of Designing With Real Data
activities.description: Lorem Ipsum is a disease that plagues the design world. In this lecture, we will go through why it is critical to include real data in your designs as early as possible

activities.name: Characteristics of Real Data
activities.description: Real Data has a story. It is your job to understand and extract that story and align it with the user's goals.
activities.instructor_notes: Need to add in the idea of data having multiple layers of interesting.

activities.name: Extracting Information and Knowledge from Data
activities.description: As a group, take the provided dataset and dig into it. What did you learn about it? What tools did you use?

assignments.description: Craft a dataset. Each of you will be given...
